data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,048,080 lost people in  Garhchiroli, Maharashtra, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Garhchiroli, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Garhchiroli, Maharashtra, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Over 97.69 percent of the people of Garhchiroli are far from Jesus.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Garhchiroli, Maharashtra, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Veerabhadreeya (Viramushti) people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Garhchiroli.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Garhchiroli, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary:
the county of Garhchiroli, Maharashtra, India has a population of 1,072,900.

We estimate Garhchiroli has 11,802 people who might know Jesus, 13,018 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,048,080 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Garhchiroli who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
